translation.en: When I was born, the world was a far simpler place.

There were villains locked away for 12 years...

...doing time with drippy hippies doing 12 months...
...for smuggling 2 million quid's worth of puff.

translation.en: My name? If you knew that, you'd be as clever as me.
translation.ko: 내 이름? 그걸 알아냈다면 나만큼 영리한 거지

translation.en: No!
I'm sorry.
